0.1.name: wordpress/easy-imdb
0.1.description:
Easy IMDB allows Wordpress users to easily embed IMDB movie images in their post using one simple tag.

Images are cached on your webserver to speed up pages as scraping from IMDB can take a while the first time you do it.

Use tag in the form of [imdb MOVIE] e.g. [imdb The Transporter]
